column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Now for the ramen. My fam and I have some dietary restrictions so we love that they have a two non-meat based broths - a vegetarian broth and a vegan broth! Their creamy vegan broth is where it's at. You can add Â sides to add to your ramen (garlic is free). We got garlic
column4: and egg (poached for me and bro
column5: season boiled for my sis). The ramen was so good!! Their noodles are deliciously dense and the broth was on point. I added sriracha but didn't need much else. The only thing I could've done without were the bamboo shoots
column6: I usually love them but wasn't feeling them here.
